creditline: Gift of James. F. and Louise H. Bell in memory of James S. and Sallie M. Bell
description: wall sconce, two-candle, Waterford type cut glass; three stems spring from central cup-shaped bracket, the two side ones terminating in candle-holders, and third, in center, terminating in eight-pointed star below which hang eight series of graduated oval crystal drops repeated at star-shaped bases of candle holders which are connected by two festoons of oval drops caught up in center by shell shaped ornament, central cup-shaped bracket rests upon concave eight-pointed star base, and from each point hang two oval drops, while one, much longer, hangs from center of base; wall connection, oval brass medallion, beaded and fluted
title: Wall sconce
